body:
Hi!

I'm just trying spack for the first time, to package a few things that I will need in my code.
One of the package.py files I'm making contained an error, and now when I try to install it again I'm getting this message:

 python2 spack install pfunit
==> Installing pfunit
==> Error: Specs openmpi@2.0.0%gcc@6.1.1~mxm~pmi~psm~psm2~slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm~verbs+vt arch=linux--x86_64^hwloc@1.11.3%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux--x86_64^libpciaccess@0.13.4%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux--x86_64^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux--x86_64 and openmpi@2.0.0%gcc@6.1.1~mxm~pmi~psm~psm2~slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm~verbs+vt arch=linux-None-x86_64^hwloc@1.11.3%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux-None-x86_64^libpciaccess@0.13.4%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux-None-x86_64^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux-None-x86_64 have the same SHA-1 prefix!

All of the dependencies seem to have installed OK, so I definitely did not expect this.
Do you have any ideas?

Thanks,
Daan
title: Error after ctrl-c or fail in build
